Polisi Ciduk Tersangka Pencurian Perangkat Tim MotoGP di Sepang
07 Nov 2019, 15:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Tiga petugas keamanan Sirkuit Sepang ditahan pihak berwajib pada Senin (4/11/2019) untuk proses investigasi kasus pencurian perangkat tim balap Moto3 yang terjadi pada pekan balap MotoGP Malaysia akhir pekan lalu, demikian yang dilansir Bernama.com.
Pada Jumat (1/11/2019) pagi, yakni sebelum sesi latihan pertama (FP1), Angel Nieto Team, CIP Green Power, RBA BOE Skull Rider, Reale Avintia Arizona 77, dan Red Bull KTM Ajo, melaporkan kehilangan berbagai perangkat balap, seperti cakram rem, komputer, heater, fork, dan lainnya.
Usai peristiwa tersebut, CEO Sepang International Circuit sekaligus Team Principal Petronas Yamaha SRT, Razlan Razali, mengaku yakin bahwa pencuri paham benar apa yang ingin mereka ambil, dan berjanji mengusut kasus ini sampai tuntas.

Police Ciduk Suspects Theft of the MotoGP Team in Sepang
Nov 7 2019, 15:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Three Sepang Circuit security officers were detained by authorities on Monday (4/11/2019) for the investigation of the theft of a Moto3 racing team device that occurred at the Malaysian MotoGP race weekend last weekend, as reported by Bernama.com.
On Friday (1/11/2019) morning, i.e. before the first training session (FP1), Angel Nieto Team, CIP Green Power, RBA BOE Skull Rider, Reale Avintia Arizona 77, and Red Bull KTM Ajo, reported losing various racing devices, such as brake discs, computers, heaters, forks and more.
After the incident, Sepang International Circuit's CEO and Petronas Yamaha SRT Team Principal, Razlan Razali, said they were sure that the thieves understood exactly what they wanted to take, and promised to investigate the case thoroughly.
